Analysis: Based on your measurements, goals, and doctor's recommendations, it is recommended to adopt a balanced diet and engage in regular exercise to improve your weight. To lower your cholesterol level, reduce intake of saturated fats and cholesterol-rich foods, and increase consumption of fruits, vegetables, and whole grains.
Recommendations: It is recommended to follow a balanced diet that includes a variety of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats. It is not necessary to fast or follow any specific diet method. Aim for 3 main meals and 2-3 small snacks per day.
